header.title: How the
header.subtitle: Transform your memories into personalized music in just 3 simple steps

step1.title: Share Your Story
step1.description: Tell us about the special person, moment, or memory you want to immortalize in music.
step1.details: Our AI analyzes every detail of your story to capture the emotional essence and create a unique musical foundation.

step2.title: AI Composes Your Music
step2.description: Our artificial intelligence creates a unique composition based on your story and musical preferences.
step2.details: We use advanced algorithms to generate melodies, harmonies, and arrangements that perfectly reflect your memory.

step3.title: Receive and Share
step3.description: Your personalized music is ready in minutes. Download, share, or gift it to someone you love.
step3.details: Available in high quality for download, streaming, or as a special digital gift for unique moments.
